name: mgpsca
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Scalar ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Scalar ` c2)
⊣ (Scalar ` c2)=(Scalar ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Scalar ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Scalar ` c2)
⊣ (Scalar ` c2)=(Scalar ` c1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wceq(csca, cslot(nat5))
-| wcel(nat5, cn)
-| wne(nat5, nat2)
body.pretty:
⊢ (Scalar ` c2)=(Scalar ` c1)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ Scalar = Slot(5)
⊣ 5 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 5 ≠ 2

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wceq(csca, cslot(nat5))
-| wcel(nat5, cn)
-| wne(nat5, nat2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Scalar ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Scalar ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ Scalar = Slot(5)
⊣ 5 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 5 ≠ 2

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wcel(nat5, cn)
-| wne(nat5, nat2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Scalar ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Scalar ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ 5 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 5 ≠ 2

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wne(nat5, nat2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Scalar ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Scalar ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ 5 ≠ 2

body.origin:
|- wne(nat5, nat2)
-| wcel(nat2, cr)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, nat5)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wcel(nat2, cr)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, nat5)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Scalar ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Scalar ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ 2 ∈ ℝ
⊣ 2[<]5

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wbr(nat2, clt, nat5)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Scalar ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Scalar ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ 2[<]5

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Scalar ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Scalar ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c2)

comment: The multiplication monoid has the same (if any) scalars as the original ring. Mostly to simplify ~ pwsmgp . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2015.)
